main event: A military report noted a sighting of a white, disc-shaped object in Sparrevohn, Alaska on 14 February 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a basketball and looked like a light beam., The sighting lasted only 2-1/2 seconds., There were no sound or trails associated with the object., The report speculates that the object was likely a meteor or satellite., The observation was made through Ground-Radar.
witness description: Military personnel at the radar station
